page.title: 07OLD AND DISUSED MILLS.
page.content:
In our survey through the block, we found 1O old, or disused mills, in the area.None of the mills are used today, and several are in a state of dilapidation.They were once powered by the River Glenmornan.This little river powered the following type of mills :-
(1) Four Corn mills. (2) Three Scutch mills. (3) One Spade foundry. (4) One Paper mill. (5) One Saw mill.
A portion of the Glenmornan River also acted as a feeder, in years gone past, for the Strabane Canal.The Canal stopped functioning around 1945.
